shortcv.p: Mr. Dimitrios Karaiskos holds a Bachelor Degree in Informatics and Telecommunications from the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, Greece. His Bachelor dissertation regarded: Service Adaptation and Roaming in 3G networks using Mobile Agent technologies. He has also been awarded with an MSc in Information Systems from the Athens University of Economics and Business, Greece. His MSc dissertation was: Development of an RFID-enabled Automated Management System under the scope of athletic ticketing.

Mr. Karaiskos is currently studying towards his PhD in Pervasive Information Systems (PIS) in the Department of Management Science and Technology of Athens University of Economics and Business, Greece. He has a great experience regarding programming on both desktop and mobile devices in various platforms and programming languages. His main interests lie in the area of Pervasive Information Systems, RFID technology and Sensor Networks.
